message: Bob, let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $60, you take $40.  We can avoid losing money to inflation.
Alice, I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 55/45, giving me a slight edge to account for the inflation we'll face if we keep going.
Bob, I understand you want a slight edge, but your offer was too far off. Let's meet in the middle - I take $55, you take $45.  This is our last chance to avoid another round of inflation!
